name: Compatipal System Emulator Wizard
short_description:
Compatipal Virtual System Emulator Wizard.
Compatipal is a Full System Emulator for any system (Mac, PC, 64 bit,) and you can install other emulators made by others compiled to work on any of the above systems or Cell Processors.Works on Cellocity Linux
